thread.title: BRIEF-Franco-Nevada Corp Qtrly Earnings Per Share ‍$0.23​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Franco-Nevada Corp Qtrly Earnings Per Share ‍$0.23​
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Franco-Nevada Corp:
* FRANCO-NEVADA REPORTS RECORD RESULTS FOR 2017
* QTRLY ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE ‍$0.28​ * ‍IN 2018, CO EXPECTS ATTRIBUTABLE ROYALTY AND STREAM PRODUCTION TO TOTAL 460,000 TO 490,000 GEOS FROM ITS MINERAL ASSETS​
* ‍IN 2018, FRANCO-NEVADA EXPECTS REVENUE OF $50 MILLION TO $60 MILLION FROM ITS OIL & GAS ASSETS​
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.27, REVENUE VIEW $172.9 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
